languages.text: "Все знают: у молчания нет вкуса. Заработать на паек можно только обменивая и продавая слова". {n}Говорит складно, но голос его склизок и увертлив. Взгляд — грязный, как испятнанная маслом одежда. Бесстыдство, с которым он смотрит на нас, говорит — он нечист... и знает это. И не кается.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Все знают: у молчания нет вкуса. Заработать на пайок можно только обменивая и продавая слова".
{n}Говоришь складно, но весь твой образ мутен и бесформен. Твоя душа такая же грязная, как масляные пятна на одежде. Ты нечист... и знаешь это. И не каешься.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

languages.text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Все знают: у молчания нет вкуса. Заработать на паек можно только обменивая и продавая слова". {n}Говорит складно, но голос его склизок и увертлив. Взгляд — грязный, как испятнанная маслом одежда. Бесстыдство, с которым он смотрит на нас, говорит — он нечист... и знает это. И не кается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: "Everyone knows that silence has no flavour. The only way to earn rations is to trade and sell words." {n}He speaks glibly, but his entire image is muddy and misshapen. His soul is as dirty as an oil-stained garment. He is unclean, and he knows it. And he is unrepentant.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

languages.text: "Jeder weiß, dass Schweigen nach nichts schmeckt. Wenn Ihr Rationen wollt, handelt lieber mit Worten." {n}Sein Ton ist freundlich, aber seine Stimme klingt schlüpfrig. Seine Augen sind schmutzig wie ein ölbeflecktes Kleidungsstück. Die Respektlosigkeit seines Blicks und seiner Worte, die er an uns richtet ... Er ist unrein, und er weiß es Er ist ohne Reue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jeder weiß, dass Schweigen nach nichts schmeckt. Wenn Ihr Rationen wollt, handelt lieber mit Worten." {n}Sein Ton ist freundlich, aber seine Stimme klingt schlüpfrig. Seine Augen sind schmutzig wie ein ölbeflecktes Kleidungsstück. Die Respektlosigkeit seines Blicks und seiner Worte, die er an uns richtet ... Er ist unrein, und er weiß es Er ist ohne Reue.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: "Jeder weiß, dass Schweigen nach nichts schmeckt. Wenn Ihr Rationen verdienen wollt, dann handelt mal lieber mit Worten." {n}Sein Ton ist freundlich, doch sein gesamtes Wesen ist schlammig und missgestaltet. Seine Seele ist so schmutzig wie ein ölbeflecktes Gewand. Er ist unsauber, und er weiß. Er ist reuelos.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

languages.text: «Todo el mundo sabe que el silencio no tiene sabor. Si quieres raciones, tienes que hablar». {n}Su tono es informal, pero su voz es meliflua y sibilina. Su mirada es tan sucia como un trapo lleno de aceite. Su expresión insolente, la arrogancia con que se dirige a vosotros... Es impuro, lo sabe y no se arrepiente de nada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Todo el mundo sabe que el silencio no tiene sabor. Si quieres raciones, tienes que hablar». {n}Su tono es informal, pero su voz es meliflua y sibilina. Su mirada es tan sucia como un trapo lleno de aceite. Su expresión insolente, la arrogancia con que se dirige a vosotros... Es impuro, lo sabe y no se arrepiente de nada.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: «Todo el mundo sabe que el silencio no tiene sabor. Si quieres raciones, tienes que hablar». {n}Su tono es informal, pero su ser es deforme y está lleno de mugre. Tiene el alma tan sucia como un trapo lleno de aceite. Es impuro, lo sabe y no se arrepiente de nada.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

languages.text: 「沈黙は何とも違った味がするって、みんな知ってるんだ。配給を得たいなら、言葉で取引を始める方がいい」{n}男は何気なく話しているが、その声は、ぬめっていて活舌も悪い。彼の目は油で染まった衣服のように汚れている。こちらへと向ける視線と言葉は不遜なもので…彼は不潔で、それを自覚している。彼が悔い改めてはいないことは確かだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「沈黙は何とも違った味がするって、みんな知ってるんだ。配給を得たいなら、言葉で取引を始める方がいい」{n}男は何気なく話しているが、その声は、ぬめっていて活舌も悪い。彼の目は油で染まった衣服のように汚れている。こちらへと向ける視線と言葉は不遜なもので…彼は不潔で、それを自覚している。彼が悔い改めてはいないことは確かだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: 「沈黙は何とも違った味がするって、みんな知ってるんだ。配給を得たいなら、言葉で取引を始める方がいい」{n}男は何気なく話しているが、その存在はどこもかしこも泥まみれで不格好だ。彼の魂は油で染まった衣服のように汚れている。彼は不潔で、それを自覚している。彼が悔い改めてはいないことは確かだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

languages.text: “所有人都知道沉默没有滋味。要是想赚点口粮的话，最好还是用你这张嘴把生意做好。”{n}他的话语漫不经心，但他的声音却非常黏滑。他的目光就像浸满油污的工作服一样肮脏，而当他转向我们的时候，他目光与言语中的傲慢更是不言而喻……他是不洁之人，不思悔改，他自己也心知肚明。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “所有人都知道沉默没有滋味。要是想赚点口粮的话，最好还是用你这张嘴把生意做好。”{n}他的话语漫不经心，但他的声音却非常黏滑。他的目光就像浸满油污的工作服一样肮脏，而当他转向我们的时候，他目光与言语中的傲慢更是不言而喻……他是不洁之人，不思悔改，他自己也心知肚明。{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: “所有人都知道沉默没有滋味。如果想赚到口粮的话，最好还是用你这张嘴把生意做好。”{n}他的话语漫不经心，但他整个人都是畸形的，浑身上下都是污泥。他的灵魂就像沾满油污的工作服一样肮脏，满是污渍。他是不洁之人，不思悔改，他自己也心知肚明。{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

languages.text: « Tout le monde sait que le silence n'a aucun goût. Si vous voulez gagner des rations, vous feriez mieux de commencer à parler. » {n}Il parle avec désinvolture, mais sa voix est à la fois obséquieuse et fuyante. Ses yeux sont aussi crasseux qu'un vêtement taché d'huile. L'impudence qui transparaît dans son regard et les propos qu'il nous adresse... Il est impur, et il le sait. Et il n'a aucune intention de se repentir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Everybody knows silence doesn't taste like anything. If you wanna earn rations, you better start dealing in words." {n}He speaks casually, but his voice is slimy and slippery. His eyes are as dirty as an oil-stained garment. The impudence in his gaze and words when he turns them to us... He is unclean, and he knows it. He is unrepentant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde sait que le silence n'a aucun goût. Si vous voulez gagner des rations, vous feriez mieux de commencer à parler. » {n}Il parle avec désinvolture, mais sa voix est à la fois obséquieuse et fuyante. Ses yeux sont aussi crasseux qu'un vêtement taché d'huile. L'impudence qui transparaît dans son regard et les propos qu'il nous adresse... Il est impur, et il le sait. Et il n'a aucune intention de se repentir.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde sait que le silence n'a aucun goût. Si vous voulez gagner des rations, vous feriez mieux de commencer à parler. » {n}Il parle avec désinvolture, mais son essence même est boueuse et difforme. Son âme est aussi sale qu'un vêtement taché d'huile. Il est impur, et il le sait. Et il n'a aucune intention de se repentir.{/n}
traits.speaker: TalkerPDChambers
